description.en: Basic knowledge is aquired using guided independent work (videolectures, written text) and confirmed by auditory seminars with help of supervisors. Aquired knowledge and skills are practiced via assessing of geriatric patients during seminars and independent practical work. At the end of the course each student presents summary of assessment and plan for further management of a geriatric patient according to defined instructions.
description.et: Iseseisva juhendatud õppe (videoloengud, lugemismaterjal) kaudu omandatakse põhilised teadmised, mida kinnistatakse auditoorsete seminaride raames koos juhendajaga. Teadmisi ja oskusi praktiseeritakse geriaatrilisi haigeid uurides nii seminarides kui iseseisvalt. Kursuse lõpul esitab üliõpilane kokkuvõtte ühe haige uurimisest ja käsitlemisest vastavalt kehtestatud nõudmistele.

objectives.en: Students learn to recognize and apply peculiarities of geriatric medicine necessary for general physicians: common health and coping problems in older and frail patients, use of comprehensive geriatric assessment, specific features of treatment, care and prevention of geriatric patients.
objectives.et: Õpitakse tundma ja rakendama eakate meditsiini eripärasid üldarstile vajalikus mahus: vananemise ja vanaea haprusega seotud sagedasemad tervise- ja toimetulekuprobleemid, igakülgne geriaatriline hindamine, geriaatriliste haigete ravi, hoolduse ning ennetuse iseärasused.

learning_outcomes.en: Students who have passed the programme successfully:

1.	know general peculiarities of manifestation of illnesses and treatment in older people (clinical examination, assessment before scheduled surgery, application of clinical guidelines in frail older people, potentially inappropriate medicines for older people);
learning_outcomes.et: 1.	tunnevad eakate inimeste haiguste avaldumise ning ravi üldisi eripärasid (eaka haige uurimise eripärad, seisundi hindamine enne plaanilist kirurgilist ravi, ravijuhendite rakendamine habrastel eakatel, eakatele potentsiaalselt sobimatud ravimid);

learning_outcomes.en: 2.	are able to perform basic comprehensive geriatric assessment (interRAI CA as an example) and use data of complete geriatric comprehensive assessment for planning of following diagnostics, treatment and care;
learning_outcomes.et: 2.	oskavad teha baastasemel igakülgset geriaatrilist hindamist (interRAI KH näitel) ja kasutada täieliku igakülgse geriaatrilise hindamise tulemusi haige edasise diagnostika, ravi ning hoolduse planeerimisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 3.	know manifestations of essential geriatric syndromes/ problems and are capable of considering them in clinical practise (frailty in old age, dementia, delirium, malnutrition, falls, pain, urinary incontinence);
learning_outcomes.et: 3.	tunnevad olulisemate geriaatriliste sündroomide ja probleemide ilminguid ning oskavad neid arvestada edasises arstlikus tegevuses (vanaea haprus, dementsus, deliirium, alatoitumine, kukkumine, valu; uriini inkontinents);

learning_outcomes.en: 4.	are aware of general principles of long term health and social care arrangement and roles of different specialists; understand the role of a physician in an interdisciplinary care team;
learning_outcomes.et: 4.	teavad pikaajalise ravi- ja hoolekandeteenuste üldist korraldust ning erinevate spetsialistide rolli haigete hoolduse korraldamisel, saavad aru arsti rollist interdistsiplinaarse hooldusmeeskonna töös;

learning_outcomes.en: 5.	know and utilise principles of geriatric ethics (ageism, elderly abuse, advance directives).
learning_outcomes.et: 5.	teavad ning rakendavad geriaatrilise eetika printsiipe (ealise diskrimineerimise vältimine, väärkohtlemise märkamine ja sekkumine, tulevikujuhendid).

independent_work.et: Self-paced (individual) work: video-lectures, written texts, clinical examination of an individual geriatric patient and presentation of the results on the last day of the course (PowerPoint presentation)

description.et: Moodle based test and PowerPoint presentation (summary of the examination of a geriatric patient)

grade_preconditions.et: Participation of all practical trainings is mandatory

grade_evaluation.et:
HINDAMISKRITEERIUMID
The course is passed successfully if the Moodle-based test with multiple-choice answers has 70% or more positive answers and the presentation of the patient meets basic requirements but may have minor shortages that should be corrected at the final presentation in the Moodle forum.
Question with multiple choice answers are included into the final exam test of Internal medicine  MV00.00.015

debt_elimination.et:
If a student has problems with participation of practical training she/he has to take direct contact with the supervisor as soon as possible. In general, the practical training should be performed with another group.
In case presentation of summary of the patient's examination has major mistakes or shortfalls the student will be given a new patient and she/he should present the summary with another group.
